languages.text: {n}Голос Соломона тих и серьезен.{/n} "Перед тем как я отвечу... Я слышал разговоры ваших офицеров, и мне кажется, что кое-чье сердце может быть разбито. Вы уверены, что после не сочтете это ошибкой?"

{n}Solomorne's voice is quiet and serious.{/n} "Before I answer that... I overheard your officers talking, and I think that you might break someone's heart. Are you sure this won't feel like a mistake to you later?"
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Соломона тих и серьезен.{/n} "Перед тем как я отвечу... Я слышал разговоры ваших офицеров, и мне кажется, что кое-чье сердце может быть разбито. Вы уверены, что после не сочтете это ошибкой?"

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの声は静かで真剣だった。{/n}「その質問に答える前に…あなたの士官たちの会話を偶然耳にしました。あなたが誰かの心を傷つけることになるかもしれないと、私は思っています。後悔することにはならないと、言い切れますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is quiet and serious.{/n} "Before I answer that... I overheard your officers talking, and I think that you might break someone's heart. Are you sure this won't feel like a mistake to you later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの声は静かで真剣だった。{/n}「その質問に答える前に…あなたの士官たちの会話を偶然耳にしました。あなたが誰かの心を傷つけることになるかもしれないと、私は思っています。後悔することにはならないと、言い切れますか？」

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Stimme ist ruhig und ernst.{/n} "Bevor ich darauf antworte ... Ich habe Eure Offiziere belauscht und denke, Ihr würdet damit jemandem das Herz brechen. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr das später nicht als Fehler betrachten werdet?"
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is quiet and serious.{/n} "Before I answer that... I overheard your officers talking, and I think that you might break someone's heart. Are you sure this won't feel like a mistake to you later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Stimme ist ruhig und ernst.{/n} "Bevor ich darauf antworte ... Ich habe Eure Offiziere belauscht und denke, Ihr würdet damit jemandem das Herz brechen. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr das später nicht als Fehler betrachten werdet?"

languages.text: {n}Solomorne vous répond d'une voix calme et sérieuse.{/n} « Avant de vous donner ma réponse... J'ai entendu vos officiers discuter et je pense que vous pourriez bien briser le cœur de quelqu'un. Vous êtes bien {mf|sûr|sûre} que vous ne regretterez pas cette décision ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is quiet and serious.{/n} "Before I answer that... I overheard your officers talking, and I think that you might break someone's heart. Are you sure this won't feel like a mistake to you later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne vous répond d'une voix calme et sérieuse.{/n} « Avant de vous donner ma réponse... J'ai entendu vos officiers discuter et je pense que vous pourriez bien briser le cœur de quelqu'un. Vous êtes bien {mf|sûr|sûre} que vous ne regretterez pas cette décision ? »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne murmura con seriedad.{/n} «Antes de responder a eso... He oído cuchichear a sus oficiales, y cabe la posibilidad de que le rompa el corazón a otra persona. ¿Seguro que no se arrepentirá luego de esto?».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is quiet and serious.{/n} "Before I answer that... I overheard your officers talking, and I think that you might break someone's heart. Are you sure this won't feel like a mistake to you later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne murmura con seriedad.{/n} «Antes de responder a eso... He oído cuchichear a sus oficiales, y cabe la posibilidad de que le rompa el corazón a otra persona. ¿Seguro que no se arrepentirá luego de esto?».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙以平静、严肃的声音开了口。{/n}“在回答你这个问题之前，我想说……我无意间听到了其他军官的谈话，我认为你这么做可能会伤透某个人的心。你确定，你以后不会认为这是个错误吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is quiet and serious.{/n} "Before I answer that... I overheard your officers talking, and I think that you might break someone's heart. Are you sure this won't feel like a mistake to you later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙以平静、严肃的声音开了口。{/n}“在回答你这个问题之前，我想说……我无意间听到了其他军官的谈话，我认为你这么做可能会伤透某个人的心。你确定，你以后不会认为这是个错误吗？”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, alçak bir sesle ve ciddiyetle konuşuyor.{/n} "Buna cevap vermeden önce... Subayları konuşurken duydum. Kalp kırabilecek biri olduğunu düşünüyorum. İleride bunun bir hata olduğunu hissetmeyeceğinden emin misin?"
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is quiet and serious.{/n} "Before I answer that... I overheard your officers talking, and I think that you might break someone's heart. Are you sure this won't feel like a mistake to you later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, alçak bir sesle ve ciddiyetle konuşur.{/n} "Buna cevap vermeden önce... Subaylarının kendi arasında konuşmalarını duydum. Kalp kırabilecek biri olduğunu düşünüyorum. İleride bunun bir hata olduğunu hissetmeyeceğinden emin misin?"
